title: Home and Away's Patrick O'Connor fuels speculation he's dating co-star Sophie Dillman
text:
Things seem to be getting serious between Home And Away stars Sophie Dillman and Patrick O'Connor.

It has long been rumoured that the pair, who play loved-up couple Ziggy Astoni and Dean Thompson, respectively, on the long-running Channel Seven soap, are enjoying a romance in real-life.

And on Thursday, Patrick, 26, further fuelled speculation he is dating his co-star after taking to Instagram to share a candid photo of the blonde beauty.

'I wish every Thursday started like this': Home and Away's Patrick O'Connor has fuelled speculation he's dating co-star Sophie Dillman after sharing a makeup free photo of the starlet at the beach

Smiling Sophie appeared makeup free in a green T-shirt, with a view of the beach as the backdrop.

Patrick captioned his post: 'I wish every Thursday started like this'.

The photo caught the attention of their co-star Georgie Parker, who plays Roo Stewart on the soap, who commented: 'Beautiful', along with heart emojis.

Looking pretty loved up! In the comments section of Patrick's post, several fans speculated that the two are in a relationship. The photo caught the attention of their co-star Georgie Parker who commented: 'Beautiful', along with heart emojis

Several fans speculated in the comments section that the two are in a relationship, including one who wrote: 'with that pic and quote....they must be [dating]'.

According to a recent The Daily Telegraph report, the pair have been going out for a number of months after meeting on set.

'Soph and Paddy (Patrick) really did start as just good friends and things developed from there. They are super private and want to keep it between them as much as possible,' a source told the publication.

Quality time off set? Photos on their Instagram accounts show Sophie and Patrick hanging out together away from the set for some time now, but it is unclear when things became serious

Photos on their Instagram accounts show Sophie and Patrick hanging out together away from the set for some time now, but it is unclear when things became serious.

Sophie has played Ziggy Astoni since 2017 while Patrick joined the cast as River Boy gang member in 2018.

Dean and Ziggy initially didn't get along well on the show, before becoming close friends and eventually, lovers.
description: Things seem to be getting serious between Home And Away stars Sophie Dillman and Patrick O'Connor.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
